title: Electronic Notebook: pH-sensitive coarse-grained model of mRNA lipid nanoparticles
description: This repository contains electronic notebooks (Jupyter) for reproducing the simulation results presented in the scientific paper Lipid shape and packing are key for optimal design of pH-sensitive mRNA lipid nanoparticles
